summary: A collection of bat files to add diverse categories of items.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#f1c232][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]If you find it annoying to have to look for the linen wraps ID code just to add it to make a certain armor that you got from a mod, then you are me. :D (Insert lame joke here)

But seriously, this "mod" contains bat files for all possible things that you may need in crafting or whatever. Hope you like it.[/size][/font]
[/color][b][u]
[size=4][color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION: [/color][color=#ff0000][IMPORTANT][/color][/size][/u][/b]
[size=3]Add all the text files to your Skyrim launcher directory, (NOT THE DATA FOLDER.)[/size]

[b][u][color=#00ffff][size=4]USAGE:
[/size][/color][/u][/b][size=3]Simple. Just open the console by pressing (~) and then type: bat [name of the text file you want].

[/size][color=#000000][size=5][u][b]CONCLUSION:
[/b][/u][/size][/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]Thank you for downloading this, and leave an endorsement out of the kindness of your heart. Enjoy Skyrim. ;)[/size][/color][/center]
author: SenseyZone
